GSD.description:
vboxguest: Do not use devm for irq

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit c1840dd1328a57587f0aca6fc829a761706484dc. For more details please see the references link.
